name: Daft Hunter
description:
It's a game made in one week with Godot Engine.

PITCH

Daft Hunter is two multiplayers game inspired by Henri Rousseau.  Each player incarnate a lion and an hunter. Your Goal is to hunt the other. Each round you change your role.

DETAILS

Developer : Les Rousseliers  (student project) ArtFX - Montpellier (France)
Release :  March 2019
Game plateform : PC 
Genre : Action-Plateformer
Language : English (menus) ; Game without text or voice 
PEGI 7 (not officially rated)

CREDITS

Game Design & Programming: 
Loïc LECOMTE

Game Artist : 
Jules JACOB
Eva BARBÉ

CONTROL

- Move with the Left Joystick

- Jump with A

- Press X to aim and release X to attack 

- Echap or Start to come back to the main menu

(You can use a keyboard, nevertheless is rather buggy, so it's better to use 2 controllers)

Install instructions

1 - Unzip the folder

2 - Plug  2 xbox 360 controller or xboxone controller)

3 - Launch "Daft Hunters.exe"

4 - Enjoy!
